title: Invention Playlist: The Telescope
itunes:title: Invention Playlist: The Telescope
description:
As the Invention podcast ends, discussions of techno-history become part of STBYM again. So let's explore some past episodes of Robert and Joe's other series. Since we're already talking about optics, let's consider the telescope...
